final_answer:
The image humorously contrasts two scenarios involving the use of stairs. On the left, a woman is depicted vigorously exercising on a stair climber machine in a gym, showing dedication to fitness. On the right, another woman stands by an actual staircase but chooses to take the elevator instead of using the stairs. 

The irony lies in the effort to mimic climbing stairs for exercise while avoiding the real opportunity to use stairs in everyday life. This satirical take highlights the sometimes contradictory behaviors people exhibit regarding fitness and convenience.
ground_truth: The image is ironic, because in the left image a woman is seen using the stair climber machine at the gym but the same woman is not ready to climb up some stairs for going to the gym and is calling for the lift
